startingPosition.instruction: Sit with the legs outstretched in front, feet together and hands besides the buttocks, or sit with a cross-legged pose. Spine Straight.

technique.instruction: Inhale and straighten the arms in front of the body at the shoulder level, keeping hands open with the palms facing up and upper arms parallel to the floor.
Exhale and bend the arms at the elbows and touch the fingers to the shoulders, upper arms parallel to the floor.
Inhale and extend the arms sideways at the shoulder level, keeping hands open with the palms facing up and upper arms parallel to the floor.
Exhale and bend the arms at the elbows and touch the fingers to the shoulders, upper arms parallel to the floor.

info: Deep breathing should be done and movement should be in sync with the breathing.
